meanings.definition: A person who is dearly loved.
meanings.sent1: My beloveds always make me smile.
meanings.sent2: She gathered her beloveds for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: The beloveds in my life never fail to bring joy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with love as she looked at her beloveds.
meanings.sent5: The bond between us and our beloveds is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are dearly loved.
meanings.sent1: Our beloveds gathered around the bonfire for stories.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to celebrate their beloveds.
meanings.sent3: The beloveds at the family reunion shared laughter and memories.
meanings.sent4: The school choir sang beautifully, a testament to their beloveds.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd filled the stadium, honoring their beloveds.
